problem_summary_simple: Find the minimum turns to print a string by printing contiguous same characters.
problem_summary_technical: Uses DP with memoization to calculate minimum operations for substrings, considering splits at matching characters.
key_insights: The problem can be broken down into subproblems of printing substrings.
When a character `s[k]` matches the end character `s[j]`, we can potentially split the problem at `k`.
Memoization is crucial to avoid recomputing results for overlapping subproblems.
